ModMetaData.name: GFL Weapons
ModMetaData.author: AIvanCP
ModMetaData.description:
Adds weapons from Girls' Frontline with unique abilities. Currently includes:
Suomi SMG - Frost-based abilities: - Freeze Shot: Launch a freezing bolt that deals damage and stuns enemies, with stun duration scaling based on nearby allies. - Frost Barrier (Ultimate): Create an area of frost terrain, deal AoE damage, apply slow debuffs, and grant allies protective shields with healing.
Weapons are player-only and can be obtained through trading, quest rewards, or crafting.
Compatible with vanilla and Combat Extended.
Credits: Original Characters and Concepts Â© Girls' Frontline / Sunborn Games / MICA Team This is a fan-made mod and is not officially affiliated with Girls' Frontline.
